name: Peeby and Jay
description: Peeby Rexxa and Jay Gyllenhaal must reach Breadtopia and make a complete sandwich before the world ends. Play as Peeby and Jay to apply equal layers of filling by dropping through the correct hole, navigating the spinning spoons of Silverville and serving up the perfect snack. If ever there was a time to prove your worth as a sandwich maker, the time to spread that love is now!
